lead_paragraph: The defendants were accused of making up names on a list of 40,000 people wanting to sue BP after the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil rig explosion and environmental disaster.

headline.print_headline: 2 Convicted and 5 Acquitted In BP Oil Spill Fraud Case
headline.main: 2 Convicted and 5 Acquitted in BP Oil Spill Fraud Case

snippet: The defendants were accused of making up names on a list of 40,000 people wanting to sue BP after the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil rig explosion and environmental disaster....
